Content:: Granada (Spanish pronunciation: [ɡɾaˈnaða]) is a department in Nicaragua. It covers an area of 1040 km² and has a population of 215,965 (2021 estimate). The capital is the city of Granada, one of North America's oldest cities. This Nicaragua location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
